dimensions: Warp x Weft: 10.6 x 7 cm (4 3/16 x 2 3/4 in.)
title: The Torn Hat (1820) by Thomas Sully (1783-1872)
description: Woven souvenir based on the painting 'The Torn Hat' (1820) by Thomas Sully (1783-1872). "W.W.L. CO. 1969 DEL. H.H." woven in lower part.  Black, gold-yellow, red, green, and salmon on white warp.
name: Souvenir ribbon portrait
